ygData.subject: Level 50
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Now all you need is a high level druid to quake or a high level wizard to supernova that whole crowd.  Very impressive seeing one player kill 20 or so
ygData.messageBody:
>Oh. By the way. I tried to reproduce the "concert" that
>Harmonic Distortion did in Blackburrow. It was pretty fun.
>Gnolls would run to me, and I was standing there playing
>Lullaby while others killed them.

Now all you need is a high level druid to 'quake' or a high
level wizard to 'supernova' that whole crowd. Very impressive
seeing one player kill 20 or so gnolls in one sweep. Major
newbie impressor.

PS...

It was mentioned that Psalm of Cooling gives ultravision, and
it most certainly does. 6pt dmg shield, ultravision, and +43
cold resist. It really chills you to the bone, =)

Harmonic Distortion, 34th gnoll lined up for the killing.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
